content: these baby boots are knitted in sockweight 4 ply yarn and the foot is about 8 cm long larger sizes can be made by adjusting the needle size and the foot is worked in a stocking stitch welt to allow for growth the boots are worked in one piece and then joined along the back of the cuff and the middle of the sole all my ravelry patterns are free to download but if you enjoy them please consider making a donation to the british liver trust where the money will go to fund research and support the families of children with a liver disease you can do this easily by going to my fundraising page here 1 happy knitting 1 https //www justgiving com/page/frankie-brown
